attributes.action: the government should release information about who we are in debt to and why.
attributes.additional_details:
If the country is in so much debt who is this to and how much interest is being paid on this.

It seems ridiculous that the worlds nations are in debt but no one knows who to or how it happened.

Basically I want the government to release data on which big businesses are running our planet into the ground for profit.

rejection.details: HMT feel this is a Freedom of Information request.
